Available for parties, concerts, and other special events
MAP & DIRECTIONS
Voted the #1 Nightclub in all of SWFL, along with 37 other awards! Dixie Roadhouse is the most fun you can have tonight. It’s a country-themed party-bar with the most fun dance floor in the area. Early evening we play 100% country music and have free line-dance lessons nightly. Late night, we’ll play all types of fun “party” & “roadhouse” dance music. Ice cold beer, killer drink specials nightly, the biggest hardwood dance floor in all of SWFL, exceptional sound and lights, and an awesome staff make this the best party in the southwest Florida area by far.
More Than Just Country
After 11pm every night, Dixie Roadhouse transforms into a “Party Bar”. The music then is super-hits of the best rock, dance, retro, novelty, and country from the past to current music. Every single song is selected to be fun, upbeat, danceable, and instantly recognizable.
Plan Your Party
Don’t just have a party – throw a very memorable event! Our party planning professionals have decades of experience planning and executing GREAT parties and events. Whatever your occasion – from a birthday celebration for 8 people, to a fundraiser or concert for 1,000 people – we know how to party!
MORE INFO
Line Dancing
Our line dance instructors and regular patrons are always here to help you learn the line dances of Dixie. We also teach line dance lessons at 7:30, 8:30, 9:30, and 11:30pm every single night we are open. You will never get lost on the Dixie dance floor.
